word_mean: 丝氨酸，羟基丙氨酸：一种存在于自然界的非必需氨基酸，C3H7NO3，可由甘氨酸合成。作为一种营养补助和喂养添加剂，用于生物学研究和试验以及培养基中

sentence.Network_en: This serine biosynthesis has been demonstrated in mitochondrial preparation.
sentence.Network_cn: 在线粒体制备中,证明有丝氨酸生物合成.

sentence.Network_en: The glycine can give rise to serine with the elimination of carbon dioxide and ammonia.
sentence.Network_cn: 甘氨酸去除二氧化碳和氨能产生丝氨酸.

sentence.Network_en: Such an assay does not preclude the direct exchange of serine and glycerol phosphate.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样一个试验并不杜绝丝氨酸同磷酸甘油的直接交换.
